events.title: Start of the Battle of Gravelines
events.description: The English fleet engaged the Spanish Armada off the coast of Gravelines during the Anglo-Spanish War.
events.significance: This battle was pivotal in halting the Spanish Armada's invasion of England, marking a turning point in naval warfare and the decline of Spanish dominance at sea.

events.title: Resignation of Wilhelm II's Chancellor Otto von Bismarck
events.description: Otto von Bismarck resigned as Chancellor of Germany after falling out of favor with Emperor Wilhelm II.
events.significance: Bismarck's resignation marked the end of an era in German politics and led to significant changes in German and European diplomatic relations.

events.title: Opening of the Second Modern Olympic Games
events.description: The II Olympiad was officially opened in Paris, France, continuing the revival of the Olympic Games in the modern era.
events.significance: This event signified the growing international importance of the Olympic Games as a global sporting event.

events.title: Bristol Zoo Gardens opens Red Pandas exhibit
events.description: Bristol Zoo in the United Kingdom opened an exhibit for Red Pandas, raising awareness for endangered species.
events.significance: This event highlighted zoo-based conservation efforts and the increasing focus on protecting endangered species globally.
